1. "Why did the mango fall from the tree? Because it was ripe and ready to mess everything up!"
2. "I tried to eat a mango fast, but it was too juicy and ended up in my lap. Now I look like I'm wearing a pie."
2. "Mangoes: the tropical fruit that's as smooth as a politician's promise, and as juicy as a broken promise."

"Why did the mango go to the doctor? Because it wasn't feeling quite Ripe enough."
3. Why did the mango go to bed early? Because it was tired of all the other fruits making fun of its brown splotchy skin!

Mangoes may not be the brightest fruit in the bunch, but they sure know how to make a splash with their juicy, pulpy goodness.
4. "Why did the mango go to the party? Because it was looking for a nice, juicy conversation!"

"Why did the mango quit its job at the donut shop? Because it was tired of getting doughnut-ted all the time!"

sampled:
